summary: This code imports necessary modules and appends the directory of the current file to the system path, allowing it to access and interact with the "main" module for document-based chat functionality.

details.comment: This code imports necessary modules and appends the directory of the current file to the system path, allowing it to access and interact with the "main" module for document-based chat functionality.
details.content:
# chat with the document.
import sys, os
sys.path.append(os.path.dirname(__file__))
import main
